articles.title: Lisandro Martinez: Brentford boss Thomas Frank admits targeting Manchester United defender in 4-0 win
articles.description: Manchester United defender Lisandro Martinez struggled to cope with Brentfords physicality in 4-0 defeat; Bees boss Thomas Frank admits targeting Argentina international in win; Jamie Redknapp believes Martinez, who stands at 5ft 9in, cannot play at centre-back in the Premier League
articles.content:
Brentford boss Thomas Frank admitted they targeted Lisandro Martinez in their 4-0 win over Manchester United, as Jamie Redknapp claimed the 5ft 9in defender cannot play at centre-back in the Premier League.

articles.title: Rugby-Foster admits uncertainty over All Blacks future despite win
articles.description: A lot of positives things … (there’s) more to come." Whether Foster will still be coach when the All Blacks host Argentina in the Rugby Championship on Aug. 27 is likely to be decided this week.
articles.content: New Zealand coach Ian Foster admits he has "no idea" if Saturday’s excellent 35-23 Rugby Championship victory over South Africa will be enough to save his job, but believes there is more to come from his team. The All Blacks had lost five of their la... [1936 chars]

articles.title: Deportivo Guaraní make football history as first Indigenous women’s team in a major final
articles.description: They have triumphed over racism, sexism, threats and physical violence to reach the final of Argentina’s Copa Salta – but equality is still a long way off
articles.content: Rosa Carema, 20, spends her days harvesting squashes on farms in the province of Salta in northern Argentina. But when the blazing sun sets over the Gran Chaco plains, she dons a tracksuit and heads down to the football pitch in her Ava Guaraní commu... [5379 chars]

articles.title: Remains of small armoured dinosaur unearthed in Argentina in first-of-its-kind discovery
articles.description: Palaeontologists announce the discovery of a previously unknown small armoured dinosaur in southern Argentina. The dinosaur, named Jakapil kaniukura, marks a first-of-its-kind discovery.
articles.content:
Palaeontologists have announced the discovery of a previously unknown small, armoured dinosaur in southern Argentina.
Key points: Named jakapil kaniukura, the dinosaur weighed up to 7 kilograms

articles.description: Wallabies injury crisis deepens as star ruled out of Argentina Test due to head knock
articles.content:
The Wallabies’ nightmare injury curse has struck yet again as hooker Folau Fainga’a became the latest star to enter the casualty ward.

articles.title: Dollar-strapped Argentina announces incentives for oil and gas industry
articles.description: Argentina announced late on Friday a package of tax and customs benefits for the oil and gas industry meant to attract dollars to the South American nation, which is battling crippling inflation and a low level of foreign currency reserves.
articles.content:
A sand refinery is seen at Vaca Muerta shale oil and gas drilling, in the Patagonian province of Neuquen, Argentina January 21, 2019. REUTERS/Agustin Marcarian
